tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MetabolomicsData (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    metabolite_name STRING,
    pathway_name STRING,
    metabolite_concentration FLOAT,
    sample_type STRING,
    study_id UUID,
    patient_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Analysis (
  analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT REFERENCES Samples(sample_id),
  metabolite_id INT REFERENCES Metabolites(metabolite_id),
  pathway_id INT REFERENCES Pathways(pathway_id),
  abundance DECIMAL,
  analysis_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Metabolites (
  metabolite_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  molecular_formula VARCHAR(50),
  mass FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Pathways (
  pathway_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Diseases (
  disease_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MetabolitePathwayRelation (
  relation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  metabolite_id INT,
  pathway_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (metabolite_id) REFERENCES Metabolites(metabolite_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (pathway_id) REFERENCES Pathways(pathway_id)
)

CREATE TABLE DiseasePathwayRelation (
  relation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_id INT,
  pathway_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (disease_id) REFERENCES Diseases(disease_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (pathway_id) REFERENCES Pathways(pathway_id)
)
